name: Contemporary Issues in Health Science
description: This course focuses on the scientific principles underlying current controversial issues in the health sciences. The four six-week modules will explore contemporary topics such as stem cells, transplantation, regenerative medicine, vaccination, and personalized medicine from the perspective of developing opinion based on scientific understanding.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, SMC One,UC One, Vic One, Woodsworth One
